answers.answer: Yes I feel exactly the same way! And time just keeps getting slower as each day passes. I practically begged my midwife for an induction date because I know this baby won't be coming anytime soon. Honestly I didn't care when she scheduled for, I just wanted a date so I can really countdown the days and know for sure when it will end. But she didn't. She told me to come back in three days and then they will decide.  I have two days till my due date
Why will they induce you if it doesnt start soon? Labor can start as late as three days past your due date and bam baby be out 7hrs later
I have diabetes, so she's already almost 7lbs now. And he said around 38 w he would start talking about inducing

question: I'll be 36w tomorrow & I just feel everyday is dragging. I want nothing more than to hold my baby! I know I'll be induced if labor doesn't start soon, but I wish they'd give me a date so I would feel a little better :/ anyone else feeling like this?
title: Time is slowing down
